attributes.action: SCRAP CERTIFICATE OF APPROVAL FOR MARRIAGE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
DOESNT IT GET FRUSTRATING WHEN THERE IS OTHER PEOPLE INTERFEREING INTO YOUR MARIAGE?
 WHEN YOU DONT HAVE THE FREEDOM TO MARRY WHEN AND WHO YOU WANT?
PEOPLE NOW HAVE TO HAVE ASK FOR APPROVAL OF WHO THEY MARRY?
IS THIS REALLY A WAY TO HELP THE IMMIGRATION PROBLEM?

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
